page.title: 16MUSIC IN KENDAL
page.content: Kendal is probably the most musical town in the country for its size. Its main feature is the{Mary Wakefield {Festival.}It first took place in 1885 and Mary Wakefield was the founder. She was very musical as a child and organised a{competition}for musical people in Kendal and surrounding area. There are lots of musical groups in Kendal mostly classical. These include {Kendal Choral Society, Kendal South {Choir}and{Westmorland Orchestra. Musical activity has grown in Kendal and the Mary Wakefield is the oldest festival in this area. The building of South Lakeland Leisure Centre has made music more popular, both for{classical and{pop concerts.}There are many pubs in Kendal which have live bands. The churches also have musical evenings and have been connected with music for a long time.
